MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 and TD13 postcode areas of Duns and Cockburnspath. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. So far, we have managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are working on grounded overhead line equipment located near to Greenhope Cottage and we now expect your supply to be restored by 4pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.18am on Tuesday 5th January 2021
